org.cougaar.util
Class TimeSpans

java.lang.Object
  org.cougaar.util.TimeSpans

public abstract class TimeSpans
extends java.lang.Object

Collection of utility methods for manipulation and construction of TimeSpan objects.

Method Summary
static TimeSpan getAfterSpan(long t)
          construct a TimeSpan which starts after the specified time and lasts until the heat death of the universe (the specified time is not in the span).
static TimeSpan getBeforeSpan(long t)
          construct a TimeSpan which begins at the dawn of time and ends just before the specified time (the specified time is not in the span)..
static TimeSpan getClosedSpan(long t0, long t1)
          construct the smalled TimeSpan which includes both time points.
static TimeSpan getEndsAtSpan(long t)
          construct a TimeSpan which begins at the dawn of time and ends at the specified time (the specified time is in the span).
static TimeSpan getForever()
          return a TimeSpan which starts at the big bang and ends at the heat death of the universe.
static TimeSpan getPoint(long t)
          construct a TimeSpan at a specific point for minimum duration
static TimeSpan getSpan(long t0, long t1)
          construct a TimeSpan object using the specified times.
static TimeSpan getStartsAtSpan(long t)
          construct a TimeSpan which starts after the specified time and lasts until the heat death of the universe (the specified time is in the span).
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Method Detail

getPoint

public static TimeSpan getPoint(long t)
construct a TimeSpan at a specific point for minimum duration

getSpan

public static TimeSpan getSpan(long t0,
                               long t1)
construct a TimeSpan object using the specified times. The resulting span is closed at the beginning and open at the end, e.g. t0 is in the span and t1 is not. This is the preferred method as it allows for cleaner temporal arithmetic.

getClosedSpan

public static TimeSpan getClosedSpan(long t0,
                                     long t1)
construct the smalled TimeSpan which includes both time points. This span will be one millisecond longer than what #getSpan(long, long) would have returned.

getBeforeSpan

public static TimeSpan getBeforeSpan(long t)
construct a TimeSpan which begins at the dawn of time and ends just before the specified time (the specified time is not in the span)..

getEndsAtSpan

public static TimeSpan getEndsAtSpan(long t)
construct a TimeSpan which begins at the dawn of time and ends at the specified time (the specified time is in the span).

getAfterSpan

public static TimeSpan getAfterSpan(long t)
construct a TimeSpan which starts after the specified time and lasts until the heat death of the universe (the specified time is not in the span).

getStartsAtSpan

public static TimeSpan getStartsAtSpan(long t)
construct a TimeSpan which starts after the specified time and lasts until the heat death of the universe (the specified time is in the span).

getForever

public static TimeSpan getForever()
return a TimeSpan which starts at the big bang and ends at the heat death of the universe.
